articles.title: An Oregon space balloon could reveal the secrets to successful Mars landings | Oregon Field Guide - Oregon Public Broadcasting
articles.description: An Oregon company is using Oregon’s vast high desert to test the parachute system of the European Space Agency’s EXOMars rover.Learn more https://www.opb.org...

articles.title: Euclid Space Telescope: Europe's mission to discover dark energy and dark matter launches - Euronews
articles.description: ESA's Euclid space telescope was launched for a six-year mission to shed light on dark energy and matter and chart the largest-ever map of the universe.
articles.content:
ESA's Euclid space telescope was launched for a six-year mission to shed light on dark energy and matter and chart the largest-ever map of the universe.

articles.author: Gianrigo Marletta and Lucie Aubourg
articles.title: Europe's space telescope launches to explore universe's dark mysteries - The Jakarta Post
articles.description: By capturing light that has taken 10 billion years to reach Earth's vicinity, the map will also offer a new view of the 13.8-billion-year-old universe's history.
articles.content:
Europe's Euclid space telescope blasted off Saturday, kicking off a first-ever mission to shed light on two of the universe's greatest mysteries: dark energy and dark matter.
